When you expend charges this way, the target forgets about the existence of the dagger, assuming you are about to make an unarmed attack. The attack is considered a surprise attack. A creature already affected by this once in a 24h period is immune to the surprise and consequent uses just have advantage.

The dagger pulses inside the target for that attack and you can use your bonus action and spend 10 more charges to make the target forget one creature for 1h. Even if the target can see the creature, they see nothing.

entries.name: Blink
entries: You can expend 2 charges to cast misty step as a bonus action.

entries.name: Arcane Sentinel
entries: You always know the spell detect magic and can cast it using 1 charge. The radius is doubled and on spending another charge, your range becomes uninterrupted.

entries.name: Vicinity breeds affinity, affinity breeds power, power yearns vicinity.
entries: As long as one of the other 3 weapons of the arcane aftermath get within 1000ft of this weapon, the creature attuned to it always knows the direction to the weapon.

Once all four weapons of the arcane aftermath are within 30ft of eachother, they fuse with the creatures they are attuned to. All creatures attuned to these weapons recieve a +2 to any ability of thier choice. Make the following changes to Backbiter.

items: Attacks and Damage rolls get a +4 bonus.

You can chose to turn invisible while holding the dagger as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you. You remain invisible until you sheath the dagger, until you attack or cast a spell, or until you use a bonus action to become visible again.
The extra damage increases to 1d12.

item.name: (Tiamat) Draconis Devourer, The Essence Reaver
item.reqAttune: by a creature of neutral/evil alignment chosen by Tiamat
entries: Forged in the heart of Tiamat's infernal lair and quenched in the blood of a celestial being, this dagger is a direct conduit of Tiamat's wrath. Its blade phases between the material and ethereal, echoing the five chromatic dragons' breath as it strikes.

You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the target suffers an additional {@dice 2d6} damage of a type chosen from acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison, as the dagger channels the power of the chromatic dragons.
Draconis Devourer, The Essence Reaver holds 30 charges for its abilities related to draconic essence, shadow manipulation, and soul reaving. It regains 1d20+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Chromatic Assault
entries: Expend 5 charges to unleash an attack that simultaneously inflicts all five chromatic dragon breath types. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 5d8} damage (1d8 for each damage type) on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

entries.name: Soul Devourer
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to attempt to sever the soul of a creature you have successfully hit with the dagger within the last minute. The target must make a Constitution saving throw or be instantly slain if they are at or below 100 hit points. If the target dies by this effect, you gain temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

entries.name: Veil of Tiamat
entries: You can expend 2 charges to cast 'shadow step' as a bonus action, allowing you to teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness.

entries.name: Dragon's Dominion
entries: In the presence of the other divine arms of the arcane aftermath, Draconis Devourer’s power is magnified. It allows the wielder to summon a chromatic dragon wyrmling of their choice once per long rest, which serves the wielder for up to 1 hour.

item.name: (Melora) Sanjeevani, The nourishing recurve
entries: This Bow was forged in the divine realms and entrusted to a hero who was on a quest to quell the consequence of the Arcane Aftermath. This Bow was one of three weapons that graced the world after the reality morphing event changed the face of Fer.

This bow, seemingly made of polished and engraved wood is not what it looks like. To the touch, it feels like holding warmth. This warmth finds its way deep inside the mind of the creature it's attuned to. This resting warmth allows the user to be proficient and choose either dexterity or thier spellcasting ability modifier to make attack and damage rolls.
Area around this crossbow gradually sprouts shrubbery and grass. If left resting for a longer period of time, the nourishing energy becomes potent enough to sustain a little forest.
When a creature within the inner range of this bow you can see rolls dice to regain hitpoints, you can use your reaction to reroll any number of that dice.
You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.
When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d8} force damage as vines begin to originate and wrap around the target.

This bow has a pool of 15 charges when attuned to. Charges can be spent to do a number of things. At the begining of a day, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 20, it regains all charges and has an additional 10 charges. On a 1, it regains 5 charges. On other rolls, it regains {@dice 1d12+3} charges upto 15.

entries.name: Cleansing flame
entries: When you take the attack action on your turn, you can use one or more of the attacks to target an ally instead. Spend 2 charges per attack. Do not roll for attack. Half way through its trajectory, the arrow shot disintegrates in flame that extinguishes by the time it reaches its target, the final few embers of flame washing over the target. The target gains the benefit of a casting of {@spell cure wounds} at lvl1.

entries.name: Nature magic
entries: After a long rest and before charges have been regained, Choose 7 levels of spells from the {@filter druid spell list upto level 5|spells|level=1|level=2|level=3|level=4|level=5|class=Druid}. You can cast these spells through this bow by spending level*2 number of charges without the need for any material components.

entries.name: Arcane Sentinel
entries: You always know the spell detect magic and can cast it using 1 charge. The radius is doubled and on spending another charge, your range becomes uninterrupted.

entries.name: Vicinity breeds affinity, affinity breeds power, power yearns vicinity.
entries: As long as one of the other 3 weapons of the arcane aftermath get within 1000ft of this weapon, the creature attuned to it always knows the direction to the weapon.

Once all four weapons of the arcane aftermath are within 30ft of eachother, they fuse with the creatures they are attuned to. All creatures attuned to these weapons recieve a +2 to any ability of thier choice. Make the following changes to Sanjeevani.

items: Attacks and Damage rolls get a +4 bonus.
Cleansing flame applies Cure wounds at level 2
The extra damage increases to 1d12.

item.name: (Melora) Verdant Whisper, The Lifebinder's Bow
item.reqAttune: by a protector of the natural world, chosen by Melora
entries: Crafted from the heartwood of the first tree and imbued with the essence of Melora’s most sacred groves, Verdant Whisper is a testament to the life-giving aspects of nature. It blooms with living foliage and its string hums with the voice of the wind.
This bow allows the wielder to use either Dexterity or their spellcasting ability modifier for attack and damage rolls, symbolizing the unity of natural force and magical prowess.
Area around this bow blossoms rapidly, accelerating the growth of plants and healing the land. Extended contact with barren soil transforms it into fertile ground.
When you heal a creature using a spell or ability, you can use your reaction to grant them additional hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the target is enveloped in radiant energy, promoting rapid regrowth and healing nearby allies for {@dice 1d8} hit points.
Verdant Whisper holds 30 charges for its divine abilities related to growth, rejuvenation, and natural harmony. It regains 1d20+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Bloom of Renewal
entries: Expend 10 charges to unleash a wave of life energy. Allies within 50 feet immediately gain {@dice 4d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier} hit points, and any dead vegetation in the area is restored to life.

entries.name: Guardian of the Wilds
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to call forth a guardian spirit of nature. This mighty guardian takes the form of a great beast or elemental, serving as a protector of the natural world and obeying your commands for up to 1 hour.

entries.name: Symbiosis of the Arcane
entries: In the presence of the other divine arms of the arcane aftermath, Verdant Whisper’s power is magnified, allowing the wielder to cast 'regenerate' on themselves or an ally once per long rest without expending a spell slot. This symbiotic power heals and binds the wielder and allies, reflecting the interconnectedness of all life.

item.name: (Auril) Stormcaller, The Tempest's Bow
entries: Crafted from the heart of a storm cloud, this bow crackles with the essence of Akadi, Goddess of Storms and Air. It vibrates with a low hum, reminiscent of distant thunder, waiting to unleash its fury.

The string of the bow is made from a strand of wind itself, and arrows loosed from it trail lightning across the sky. The bow's power is such that its arrows can summon wind gusts to guide their path, ensuring they strike true.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Upon striking a target, the arrow unleashes a burst of wind, potentially knocking the target prone if they fail a Strength saving throw (DC 15).

This bow has a pool of 20 charges for its special abilities. Charges can be spent to summon a storm on the battlefield, control winds for precise shots, or create barriers of gusting wind. Charges regenerate under stormy conditions.

entries.name: Storm's Fury
entries: As an action, you can expend 5 charges to call down a lightning bolt (as per the spell) on a target hit by an arrow from this bow within the last round.

entries.name: Wind's Guidance
entries: When you take the Attack action, you can expend 1 charge to gain advantage on all arrow shots made with this bow until the end of the turn.

entries.name: Galeforce Barrier
entries: Expend 3 charges to create a wall of wind (as per the wind wall spell) that lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Harmony of the Storm
entries: This bow sings in the presence of other artifacts of Akadi, guiding its wielder to them. If within 1 mile of another artifact of Akadi, the wielder knows its direction.

item.name: (Auril) Tempest's Sovereignty, The Boundless Gale
item.reqAttune: by a devoted champion of Auril
entries: Tempest's Sovereignty is a divine instrument of Akadi's will, embodying the boundless expanse of the skies and the unbridled power of the storm. Forged from a cloud solidified by divine essence and strings plucked from the winds of a hurricane, this bow commands the weather itself.

Arrows loosed from Tempest's Sovereignty ride the storm winds, their paths illuminated by bolts of lightning. They strike with the force of a tempest, their thunderclap booms heralding Akadi's dominion.
You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each arrow shot is enveloped in a sheath of lightning, dealing an additional {@dice 2d8} lightning damage on a hit.

This bow possesses 30 charges for invoking its divine powers, including summoning storms, directing lightning strikes, and controlling the winds with unparalleled mastery. Charges are replenished at dawn, and the bow regains 1d20+10 charges.

entries.name: Stormcaller's Wrath
entries: Expend 10 charges to unleash a fury of the storm, creating a 60-foot radius storm centered on a point you can see within range. For 1 minute, lightning strikes at up to three points you choose within the storm's area, each strike dealing {@dice 4d10} lightning damage to creatures within 5 feet of the point.

entries.name: Gale's Embrace
entries: As a bonus action, expend 5 charges to grant yourself the ability to fly at a speed of 60 feet for 10 minutes, as winds lift you aloft. While flying, you have advantage on all attacks made with this bow.

entries.name: Eye of the Hurricane
entries: Expend 7 charges to create a 20-foot radius sphere of calm air centered on a point you can see within 120 feet. Within this sphere, allies gain immunity to lightning and thunder damage, and any sounds are silenced. The sphere lasts for 1 minute.

entries.name: Dominion of the Sky
entries: This bow resonates with other divine artifacts of Akadi, indicating their presence. If within 5 miles of another divine arm of Akadi, the wielder knows its direction and distance.

item.name: (Erathis) Harmonizer's Gavel
entries: This warhammer embodies the principles of order, law, and civilization. Forged from metals mined from the depths of the most ancient cities, its head is inscribed with the first laws of creation.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the target is imbued with a sense of order, possibly halting their action if they fail a Wisdom saving throw (DC 15).
Harmonizer's Gavel holds 20 charges for its abilities, including enforcing law, creating constructs, and summoning guardians of order. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Edict of Harmony
entries: Expend 5 charges to cast 'command' (without needing to maintain concentration) on any number of creatures within 30 feet of you.

entries.name: Construct Conjuror
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to summon a guardian construct that obeys your commands for 1 hour.

item.name: (Erathis) Order's Paramount Mace
entries: This mace is the ultimate instrument of law, its head crafted from a fragment of the first city's foundation stone. It shines with a light that pierces deceit and chaos, a beacon of civilization's might.
You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Enemies hit by the mace are marked by the light of law, reducing their ability to lie or deceive for 24 hours.
Order's Paramount Mace has 30 charges, regaining 1d20+10 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to binding agreements, enforcing truth, and creating bastions of law.

entries.name: Bastion of the Just
entries: Expend 15 charges to create a 60-foot radius sphere of divine law for 10 minutes. Within this sphere, all spells and effects that create chaos or disorder are suppressed.

entries.name: Chains of Order
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to summon chains of light that bind a target creature. The creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained for 1 minute.

item.name: (Lliira) Jubilee's Whisper
entries: This rapier sings with the laughter of Lliira, its blade light and swift, crafted from a material as buoyant as joy itself. It vibrates slightly, as if eager to dance.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a successful hit, the target is affected by an uncontrollable urge to laugh, potentially losing their next action if they fail a Wisdom saving throw (DC 15).
Jubilee's Whisper holds 20 charges for its abilities, which include spreading happiness, calming emotions, and inducing laughter. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Festival's Call
entries: Expend 5 charges to cast 'calm emotions' in a 20-foot radius centered on you.

entries.name: Dance of Liberation
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to force all creatures of your choice within 30 feet to begin dancing joyously, effectively incapacitating them for 1 minute or until they take damage.

item.name: (Lliira) Ecstasy's Echo
entries: Forged from a ray of the setting sun's light and the first laugh of a newborn, this rapier embodies the essence of joy and freedom. Its hilt sparkles with gemstones that represent the myriad joys of life.
You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each strike releases a wave of euphoria, granting allies within 20 feet a bonus to their next attack roll or saving throw.
Ecstasy's Echo possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers can instigate festivals, inspire courage, and banish sorrow.

entries.name: Rapture's Domain
entries: Expend 20 charges to transform an area up to a 1-mile radius into a zone of sheer happiness for 12 hours. Within this zone, all creatures are immune to fear and despair.

entries.name: Harmony's Resonance
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to release a sonorous melody that heals allies within 30 feet for {@dice 4d8} hit points and grants them immunity to being charmed or frightened for 1 minute.

item.name: (Cyric) Whisper of Discord
entries: This dagger is as elusive as the truth in Cyric's realm, with a blade that seems to shift and blur, making its edges indistinct. Its handle is adorned with symbols of deceit and betrayal.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the target is afflicted with paranoia, doubting allies and hearing whispers of betrayal, imposing disadvantage on all their attack rolls against anyone but you for the next minute.
Whisper of Discord holds 20 charges for its deceptive abilities, including casting illusions, manipulating shadows, and sewing distrust. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Veil of Lies
entries: Expend 5 charges to cast 'invisibility' on yourself. While invisible, your first attack from invisibility forces the target to make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for 1 hour or until you or your allies harm them.

entries.name: Echoes of Strife
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to create an illusory duplicate of yourself within 30 feet. This duplicate can move and speak as directed and lasts for 10 minutes. If attacked, the duplicate dissipates.

item.name: (Cyric) Shadow of the Deceiver
entries: Forged in the shadows of the darkest deceit, this dagger embodies the very essence of Cyric's power. Its blade is a fragment of night, absorbing light and hope.

You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a successful hit, the target is ensnared in shadows, reducing their speed to 0 and imposing disadvantage on all saving throws for 1 turn.
Shadow of the Deceiver possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers are mastery over darkness, illusions that can drive one to madness, and the ability to slip between shadows.

entries.name: Realm of Deceit
entries: Expend 20 charges to envelop a 100-foot radius in an illusory landscape of your design for 10 minutes. Within this area, enemies are disoriented and have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

entries.name: Nightmare's Embrace
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to plunge a creature you can see within 60 feet into a terrifying illusion. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened and take {@dice 4d6} psychic damage as it experiences its worst fears.

item.name: (Kord) Warbringer
entries: Forged from the remnants of a meteorite that fell during a great battle, Warbringer is a symbol of Kord's might. The blade thrums with power with each swing, echoing the clash of ancient wars.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a critical hit, the sword unleashes a shockwave, dealing {@dice 1d8} force damage to all enemies within 10 feet of the target.

Warbringer holds 20 charges for invoking its warlike powers, including enhancing the wielder's strength, calling upon the spirits of warriors past, and inducing fear in enemies. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Call to Arms
entries: Expend 5 charges to cast 'crusader's mantle' centered on yourself.

entries.name: Battle's Roar
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to emit a fearsome roar. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute.

item.name: (Kord) Thunderclash, the Stormblade
entries: This legendary blade was born from the heart of a storm, quenched in the blood of a godslayer. Thunderclash resonates with the sound of a thousand battles, each swing calling forth the fury of the storm.
You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each strike calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing an additional {@dice 2d6} lightning damage to the target.

Thunderclash possesses 40 charges for commanding the battlefield with divine fury, including summoning storms, empowering allies, and striking terror into the hearts of enemies. It regains 1d20+20 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Stormlord's Decree
entries: Expend 20 charges to transform the battlefield into a stormy arena. For 10 minutes, lightning strikes enemies at your command, dealing {@dice 4d6} lightning damage per strike.

entries.name: Valor's Surge
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to bolster the resolve of allies within 50 feet, granting them immunity to fear and an extra {@dice 1d6} damage on all attacks for 1 minute.

item.name: (Daedalus) Mechanist's Crossbow
entries: Ingeniously designed by Daedalus himself, this crossbow incorporates mechanisms far ahead of its time, featuring gears and springs that enhance its firing capabilities.

You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the bolt releases mechanical spiders that may hamper the target's movement, reducing their speed by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.
Mechanist's Crossbow holds 20 charges for its inventive abilities, including creating temporary constructs, laying traps, and enhancing bolts with various effects. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Architect's Bolt
entries: Expend 5 charges to fire a bolt that constructs a temporary barrier of metal and stone, providing cover.

entries.name: Inventor's Volley
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to unleash a volley of bolts that transform into a swarm of mechanical constructs, attacking up to 3 different targets within range.

item.name: (Daedalus) Artificer's Precision
entries: A masterpiece of divine engineering, this crossbow combines the essence of Daedalus's skill with materials from realms beyond imagination. Its accuracy is unparalleled, turning each bolt into a deadly projectile guided by the will of its wielder.
You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each bolt can phase through obstacles, ensuring it reaches its target as intended.

Artificer's Precision has 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers include manipulating the battlefield with constructs, enhancing the wielder's sight to see through walls, and firing bolts with varied magical effects.

entries.name: Master Builder's Decree
entries: Expend 20 charges to instantly erect a fortification around a specified point within range, complete with walls, gates, and towers, lasting for 24 hours.

entries.name: Engineer's Arsenal
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to transform the crossbow into a siege weapon of choice, granting it the ability to break through fortifications or decimate ranks of enemies in a single shot.

item.name: (Diana) Moonshadow Longbow
entries: Crafted under the light of a lunar eclipse, this longbow channels the mystic power of the moon. Its arrows are fletched with feathers that gleam like moonlight, capable of finding their mark in complete darkness.
You have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the arrow bathes the target in a silvery glow, making them visible even in magical darkness for 1 minute.

Moonshadow Longbow holds 20 charges for its lunar abilities, including creating areas of moonlight, enchanting arrows with lunar energy, and calling down moonbeams. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Lunar Beacon
entries: Expend 5 charges to create a 30-foot radius of moonlight, which lasts for 10 minutes. Within this light, allies gain advantage on Perception checks and can see through illusions.

entries.name: Moonbeam Volley
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to summon a volley of moonbeams that strike up to 3 targets within range, dealing {@dice 3d10} radiant damage to each.

item.name: (Diana) Lunar's Grace
entries: Blessed by Diana during a rare celestial alignment, this longbow is a conduit of the moon's full majesty. Its draw is as smooth as moonlight on water, and its arrows pierce the night with a trail of stars.

You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Each arrow emits a piercing lunar radiance, dealing an additional {@dice 2d6} radiant damage and temporarily blinding the target on a critical hit.

Lunar's Grace possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its dominion over the night includes calling celestial guardians, enveloping areas in supernatural darkness or brilliant moonlight, and guiding arrows to seek out hidden foes.

entries.name: Celestial Call
entries: Expend 20 charges to summon a guardian spirit of the moon. This luminous entity fights by your side, casting 'moonbeam' at your command and protecting you from harm.

entries.name: Night's Mantle
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to cloak yourself and allies within 50 feet in the mantle of the night, granting invisibility in shadows and advantage on all stealth checks for 10 minutes.

item.name: (Selune) Lure of the Moonlit Dance
entries: This enchanting pendant, shaped like a crescent moon, is crafted from moonstone and emits a soft, captivating glow. It sways gently with an unseen, mystical breeze, resonating with the power of Selune to bewitch the hearts and minds of those around.
While attuned to this item, you have a +3 bonus to Charisma (Persuasion) and Charisma (Deception) checks. Additionally, you can cast 'charm person' at will, without expending a spell slot.

Lure of the Moonlit Dance holds 20 charges for its mesmerizing abilities, including casting spells to enchant or beguile, creating illusions of beauty, and influencing emotions. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Moonlit Soirée
entries: Expend 5 charges to create an area of 30 feet radius around you where the atmosphere becomes enchanting and irresistible. Within this area, you can perform a dance that captivates all who see it, forcing them to make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for the duration of the dance, up to 10 minutes.

entries.name: Selune's Embrace
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to envelop a target in an aura of desirability. For 1 hour, the target gains advantage on all Charisma checks directed at creatures of their choice.

item.name: (Selune) Siren's Call of the Silvered Path
entries: An ethereal harp, strung with silvery threads that shimmer in moonlight, its music weaves the very essence of allure and persuasion. Playing it feels as if the moon herself guides your hands, drawing forth melodies that sway the soul.
While attuned to this item, you gain the ability to cast 'mass suggestion' without expending a spell slot, once per long rest. Your Charisma score is also increased by 2, up to a maximum of 24.

Siren's Call of the Silvered Path possesses 40 charges for its divine powers of seduction and control, including weaving compelling illusions, altering memories to appear more favorable, and summoning creatures of the night. It regains 1d20+20 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Lunar Fascination
entries: Expend 20 charges to cast an amplified version of 'dominate person' on any number of targets within a 60-foot radius. Affected targets regard you as a cherished friend and ally and will protect you even over themselves until the spell ends.

entries.name: Nocturne of the Enthralled Moon
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to play a captivating melody. All who hear it within 100 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw or be stunned, lost in the beauty of the music, for 1 minute. Allies hearing the melody gain a bardic inspiration die (1d10).

item.name: (Raven Queen) Shroud of the Final Journey
item.reqAttune: by a follower of The Raven Queen
entries: This ethereal cloak is woven from the shadows of the passing souls, embodying the transition between life and death. It whispers softly, carrying the secrets of the end to those who listen.
While wearing this cloak, you gain the ability to see into the Ethereal Plane. Additionally, you can cast 'speak with dead' at will, without expending a spell slot.
Shroud of the Final Journey holds 20 charges for its abilities related to death, guiding souls, and providing comfort to those nearing their journey's end. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Veil of Souls
entries: Expend 5 charges to become ethereal for up to 10 minutes. While ethereal, you can pass through objects and are invisible to the living world.

entries.name: Call of the Departed
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to summon a spirit from the Raven Queen's domain. This spirit can perform a task for you, deliver a message, or protect a location for up to 24 hours before returning to the afterlife.

item.name: (Raven Queen) Mantle of the Shadowed Path
item.reqAttune: by a champion of The Raven Queen
entries: Crafted from the essence of shadow and the chill of the void, this mantle is a powerful symbol of The Raven Queen's dominion over death. It shifts and moves with a life of its own, enveloping the wearer in comforting darkness.

While wearing this mantle, you have advantage on saving throws against death effects and necrotic damage. You can also cast 'phantom steed' and 'shadow of moil' each once per long rest without expending a spell slot.
Mantle of the Shadowed Path possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to walking through shadows, commanding spirits, and enshrouding allies in protective darkness.

entries.name: Queen's Decree
entries: Expend 20 charges to open a gateway to the Shadowfell for up to 1 minute. This gateway can transport you and your allies to a specific location within the Shadowfell or be used to summon shadowy creatures to aid you.

entries.name: Eclipse of the End
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to create an area of magical darkness in a 60-foot radius that even magical light cannot illuminate. Within this darkness, enemies are blinded, and allies gain temporary hit points.

item.name: (Varus) Echoes of the Deep
entries: This amulet, shaped like a tear, holds a piece of the Underdark's essence. It vibrates softly, emitting sorrowful echoes that resonate with the grief of lost souls.

While wearing this amulet, you can communicate telepathically with any creature within 60 feet that you can see. Additionally, you can cast 'darkness' and 'silence' at will, without expending a spell slot.
Echoes of the Deep holds 20 charges for its abilities related to manipulation of shadows, silence, and instilling despair. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Whispers of the Lost
entries: Expend 5 charges to send a sorrowful whisper to a creature within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be overwhelmed by grief, becoming incapacitated for 1 minute.

entries.name: Shroud of Sorrow
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to envelop yourself and allies within 30 feet in a protective shroud of shadows. For 10 minutes, this shroud grants advantage on Stealth checks and resistance to psychic damage.

item.name: (Varus) Abyssal Mourner's Lament
entries: Forged from the core of the Underdark and imbued with the essence of eternal grief, this cloak weaves the darkness and despair of the abyss with the wearer's form.

While wearing this cloak, you gain immunity to psychic damage and the ability to cast 'mind blank' on yourself once per long rest, without expending a spell slot. You also gain the ability to see in darkness, magical or otherwise.

Abyssal Mourner's Lament possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to manipulating the fabric of reality within the Underdark, summoning creatures of the abyss, and cloaking allies in invisibility.

entries.name: Call of the Depths
entries: Expend 20 charges to open a rift to the Underdark for up to 1 minute. This rift can transport you and your allies to a specific location within the Underdark or be used to summon creatures of the abyss to aid you.

entries.name: Veil of the Endless Night
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to envelop an area in a 60-foot radius in absolute darkness that dampens all sound. Within this veil, enemies are disoriented and have disadvantage on all attacks and perception checks.

item.name: (Vecna) Eye of the Whispered Secrets
entries: This eerie, glowing orb resembles an eye and pulses with arcane energy. It allows its wielder to peer into the deepest secrets and the darkest corners of magic.
While holding this orb, you can cast 'detect thoughts' at will, without expending a spell slot. Additionally, you gain the ability to see magical auras, as per 'detect magic', constantly active.
Eye of the Whispered Secrets holds 20 charges for its abilities related to divination, necromancy, and secret-keeping. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Vault of Forbidden Knowledge
entries: Expend 5 charges to temporarily gain knowledge of a spell you do not know or cannot cast. For the next 10 minutes, you can cast this spell once without expending a spell slot or material components.

entries.name: Shroud of Concealment
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to envelop yourself in a veil of shadows that renders you invisible to both sight and divination magic for 1 hour.

item.name: (Vecna) The Necrotic Codex
entries: A grim tome bound in skin that whispers dark incantations, The Necrotic Codex contains forbidden knowledge that can bend the laws of life and death.
While attuned to this codex, you gain the ability to cast 'animate dead' at will, without expending a spell slot. Additionally, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus each increase by 2.

The Necrotic Codex possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to summoning undead, creating areas of deathly silence where no magic can be cast, and peering into the future.

entries.name: Legion of the Damned
entries: Expend 20 charges to summon a horde of undead servants under your command. These undead do not count against your limit for controlling undead and last for 24 hours.

entries.name: Seal of the Arcanum
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to place a curse on a target within sight. The curse prevents the target from casting any spells or using magical abilities for 10 minutes. A successful Wisdom saving throw negates this effect.

item.name: (Asmodeus) Infernal Compact
entries: A darkly ornate scroll encased in flames that never consume it, this compact contains the power to bind and enforce infernal contracts. Its text shifts to reveal the terms of damning agreements.
While holding this compact, you gain proficiency in Persuasion and Deception. You can cast 'geas' once per long rest without expending a spell slot.
Infernal Compact holds 20 charges for its abilities related to contracts, coercion, and infernal bargains. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Bond of the Infernal
entries: Expend 5 charges to bind a creature within sight to an infernal contract. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to fulfill the terms, suffering {@dice 6d10} psychic damage if it knowingly breaks them.

entries.name: Curse of Obedience
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to place a powerful curse on a target. The cursed target must obey your commands or suffer disadvantage on all ability checks, saving throws, and attacks until the curse is lifted.

item.name: (Asmodeus) Scepter of the Archfiend
entries: This scepter is a symbol of ultimate authority over the Nine Hells, crafted from brimstone and adorned with jewels that burn with an inner fire. Its presence commands respect and fear.
While wielding this scepter, you can use an action to summon a devil loyal to Asmodeus (up to CR 10). This devil serves you for 1 hour, after which it returns to the Hells.

Scepter of the Archfiend possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers include dominating the will of others, creating infernal gates, and enforcing diabolical contracts with unbreakable bonds.

entries.name: Dominion Over Hellfire
entries: Expend 20 charges to unleash hellfire in a 60-foot radius. Creatures within the area must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 8d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The hellfire ignites flammable objects and cannot be extinguished by non-magical means.

entries.name: Infernal Edict
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to issue a command that resonates with the power of the Nine Hells. Every creature of your choice within hearing range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow your command to the best of its ability for the next 24 hours.

item.name: (Bahamut) Scale of the Platinum Dragon
entries: A single, luminous scale from Bahamut himself, this artifact symbolizes the ultimate balance of justice and mercy. It shimmers with a celestial light, and its touch brings a sense of peace and resolve.
While holding this scale, you gain advantage on all saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Additionally, you can cast 'zone of truth' at will, without expending a spell slot.
Scale of the Platinum Dragon holds 20 charges for its abilities related to protection, truth-seeking, and dispensing justice. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Platinum Shield
entries: Expend 5 charges to summon a divine shield that grants you and allies within 10 feet resistance to all damage types for 1 minute.

entries.name: Judgment of the Platinum Dragon
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to illuminate a target with divine light. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed with remorse for their injustices, unable to move or act for up to 1 minute. A target that succeeds on its saving throw is still filled with a sense of guilt, suffering disadvantage on attack rolls against you and your allies for the duration.

item.name: (Bahamut) Gavel of the Righteous
entries: Forged from celestial platinum and imbued with the essence of Bahamut’s breath, this gavel commands respect and authority. Its strikes resonate with the power to restore order and justice.

While wielding this gavel, you can use an action to issue a divine decree that compels truth and righteousness. Enemies within 30 feet who can hear you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be compelled to confess their sins and transgressions.
Gavel of the Righteous possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to banishing evil, breaking curses, and sanctifying ground.

entries.name: Aura of the Platinum Dragon
entries: Expend 20 charges to radiate an aura of divine justice for 10 minutes. Within this aura, allies gain immunity to fear and charm effects, and any attempt to lie directly to them fails.

entries.name: Mantle of Mercy
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to wrap an ally in a protective mantle. For 1 hour, the ally gains the benefits of 'protection from energy' and 'death ward'.

item.name: (Ilmater)Cincture of the Enduring
entries: This belt, woven from the hair of saints and martyrs, embodies Ilmater's resilience and compassion for those who suffer. It radiates a comforting warmth, and its touch can ease the deepest pains.
While wearing this belt, you gain resistance to non-magical damage and the ability to cast 'lesser restoration' at will, without expending a spell slot.
Cincture of the Enduring holds 20 charges for its abilities related to healing, protection from suffering, and offering solace. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Mantle of the Suffering
entries: Expend 5 charges to envelop yourself and allies within 20 feet in a protective aura. For 10 minutes, this aura halves the damage received from all sources.

entries.name: Embrace of Ilmater
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to release a wave of divine energy that heals allies within 30 feet for {@dice 4d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier} hit points and cures them of all diseases, blindness, and deafness.

item.name: (Ilmater) Bonds of the Martyr
entries: These ethereal chains are a testament to the ultimate sacrifice of Ilmater's followers. They shimmer with a divine light, capable of binding the wounds of the spirit as well as the flesh.
While bound by the chains, you can transfer damage taken by allies within 30 feet to yourself. Additionally, you gain immunity to being frightened or charmed.

Bonds of the Martyr possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers extend to absorbing suffering, breaking bonds of enslavement, and instilling courage in the hearts of the downtrodden.

entries.name: Sacrifice of the Martyr
entries: Expend 20 charges to take upon yourself the ailments of others. You can end any condition afflicting allies within 60 feet, transferring them to yourself. For the next hour, you have advantage on saving throws made to overcome these transferred conditions.

entries.name: Chains of Compassion
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to bind up to 10 creatures of your choice within 60 feet in chains that heal rather than harm. Over the next minute, each bound creature regains {@dice 2d8} hit points at the start of each of their turns.

item.name: (Torm) Gauntlet of the Faithful Guardian
entries: Forged from celestial bronze and inscribed with vows of fealty and sacrifice, this gauntlet is a symbol of Torm's unwavering protection. It glows softly with a divine light, empowering those who stand in defense of the innocent.

While wearing this gauntlet, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on an attack roll made against an ally within 5 feet of you. Additionally, you gain the ability to cast 'shield of faith' at will, without expending a spell slot.
Gauntlet of the Faithful Guardian holds 20 charges for its abilities related to protection, empowerment, and healing. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Protector's Sacrifice
entries: Expend 5 charges to absorb the damage directed at allies within 10 feet. For the next minute, any damage they would take is transferred to you instead.

entries.name: Aura of Courage
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to radiate an aura of divine courage for 10 minutes. Allies within 30 feet gain immunity to fear and an additional +2 bonus to AC as long as they remain within the aura.

item.name: (Torm) Mantle of the Divine Sentinel
entries: This celestial mantle, woven from threads of pure valor, embodies Torm's essence of courage and sacrifice. It shimmers with a golden light, and its presence inspires heroic deeds.

While donned, the Mantle grants you the ability to cast 'aura of purity' and 'aura of life' each once per long rest, without expending a spell slot. You also gain resistance to all damage as long as you are acting to protect others.
Mantle of the Divine Sentinel possesses 40 charges, regaining 1d20+20 charges at dawn. Its powers include creating sanctuaries of safety, shielding the innocent, and rallying the disheartened.

entries.name: Sentinel's Stand
entries: Expend 20 charges to plant yourself firmly on the ground, becoming an immovable beacon of defense. For the next hour, any ally within 50 feet gains half cover, resistance to all damage, and you can use your reaction to redirect any attack targeting them to yourself.

entries.name: Call to Arms
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to summon celestial allies equivalent to a 'summon celestial' spell without expending a spell slot. These celestials obey your commands and fight to protect you and your allies for up to 1 hour.

item.name: (Avandra) Wanderer's Compass
entries: This ancient compass doesn't point north but rather guides its holder toward opportunities for change and growth. Its needle spins with a will of its own, glowing when fortune favors the path ahead.

While carrying this compass, you gain advantage on all saving throws against spells and effects that restrict movement. Additionally, you can cast 'freedom of movement' on yourself at will, without expending a spell slot.
Wanderer's Compass holds 20 charges for its abilities related to navigation, luck, and escape. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Path of Fortune
entries: Expend 5 charges to reveal the most auspicious path to take. For the next hour, you and your allies gain a +10 bonus to movement speed and advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) and Wisdom (Survival) checks.

entries.name: Escape the Bonds
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to automatically succeed on any attempt to escape non-magical restraints or free yourself from grapples or confinements.

item.name: (Avandra) Luckbringer's Dice
entries: These enchanted dice are imbued with Avandra's capricious spirit, changing fate with each roll. They gleam with an ever-shifting pattern, mirroring the endless possibilities that lie in fortune's favor.

While in possession of the dice, you can reroll any saving throw, attack roll, or ability check you make but must take the second result. Once per long rest, you may choose to take a 20 on any one roll instead.
Luckbringer's Dice holds 30 charges for its divine abilities, focused on altering outcomes, enhancing luck, and ensuring freedom of choice. It regains 1d20+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Favor of the Fates
entries: Expend 10 charges to grant yourself or an ally the effect of the 'luck' spell for 1 hour. During this time, the target can add a d10 to any roll made.

entries.name: Gambit of the Gods
entries: As an action, expend 15 charges to invoke a powerful gamble with fate. Roll the Luckbringer's Dice to determine the outcome: odd numbers grant you and your allies a major boon for the next minute, such as maximized damage rolls or immunity to a damage type, while even numbers impose a challenge or trial to overcome.

item.name: (Zehir) Venomheart Phylactery
entries: This vile container pulses with a dark energy, its surface slick with an ever-moving layer of poison. Inside, a heart beats slowly, imbued with the essence of Zehir's deadliest venoms.

While in possession of the phylactery, you gain immunity to poison damage and the poisoned condition. Additionally, you can cast 'contagion' at will, without expending a spell slot, channeling Zehir's affinity for disease and decay.
Venomheart Phylactery holds 20 charges for its abilities related to poison, disease, and shadow manipulation. It regains 1d10+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Whispers of the Serpent
entries: Expend 5 charges to communicate telepathically with any creature you can see within 60 feet, filling its mind with insidious whispers that can frighten or manipulate.

entries.name: Veil of Shadows
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to cloak yourself in darkness for 1 hour. This veil grants you advantage on Stealth checks and allows you to move without making a sound, embodying Zehir's dominion over the unseen.

item.name: (Zehir) Necrosis Fang Dagger
item.reqAttune: by a chosen assassin of Zehir
entries: Forged from a shard of darkness and the fang of a venomous beast, this dagger is the embodiment of Zehir’s deadliest aspects. Its blade drips with a necrotic poison that corrupts flesh and spirit alike.

You have a +5 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. On a hit, the target suffers an additional {@dice 2d6} poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target takes {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage at the start of each of their turns.
Necrosis Fang Dagger holds 30 charges for its abilities related to assassination, stealth, and the spreading of venomous influence. It regains 1d20+10 charges at dawn.

entries.name: Shadow Strike
entries: Expend 5 charges to blend into the shadows, becoming invisible until you make an attack or cast a spell. Your first attack from invisibility deals an additional {@dice 3d6} necrotic damage.

entries.name: Plague Bearer
entries: As an action, expend 10 charges to imbue the dagger with a virulent plague. The next creature you successfully hit with the dagger becomes a carrier of a contagious disease determined by the DM, spreading it to others within close proximity over the next 7 days.
